greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(2 - Product_{k>=2} 1/(1 - x^k)).
mathematica: nmax = 39; CoefficientList[Series[1/(2 - Product[1/(1 - x^k), {k, 2, nmax}]), {x, 0, nmax}], x]
a[0] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] =  Sum[(PartitionsP[k] - PartitionsP[k - 1]) a[n - k], {k, 1, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 39}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 21 2019
